summary: This test module contains a unittest suite that verifies the behavior of the random axis flip transform for dictionary-based data. It checks probability handling, axis selection, metadata propagation, compatibility with lazy resampling, and the ability to invert the transformation, ensuring deterministic outcomes when a seed is set.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the random axis flipping augmentation used in medical imaging pipelines, preventing regressions and ensuring consistent preprocessing across diverse datasets.
